name: Splited Souls
description:
After waking up in the middle of a forest our hero will face all kind of monsters to survive. Solve the mystery and bond all the souls that have been splited in the different worlds you visit.

Splited Souls is the result of trying to recreate Souls mechanics in 2D. For now it is just a demo, if it has a good feedback I will continue. My objective was try to make a game with free material from this website. All artists are credited inside the game.

In v0.1 you are able to see Vivid Forest, the first zone. And battle one kind of boss and enemy.

If I get to release v0.2 you will see the completed version of Vivid Forest with different kind of enemies, and two more worlds with different enemies to explore: Ghost Town and Nexus.

I hope you enjoy the game!
